analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0x2bf91c18cd4ae9c2f2858ef9fe518180f7b5096d.sol:
	Contract _KiwiToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x2bf91c18cd4ae9c2f2858ef9fe518180f7b5096d.sol#420-421)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

_KiwiToken._BLOCKS_PER_READJUSTMENT should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x2bf91c18cd4ae9c2f2858ef9fe518180f7b5096d.sol#145-147)
_KiwiToken._MAXIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x2bf91c18cd4ae9c2f2858ef9fe518180f7b5096d.sol#148-150)
_KiwiToken._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x2bf91c18cd4ae9c2f2858ef9fe518180f7b5096d.sol#148)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/1/0x2bf91c18cd4ae9c2f2858ef9fe518180f7b5096d.sol#259-261:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
